```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(tsrecipes)
library(recipes)
```

```{r}
tsdb <- tsrecipes::prices
```


```{r}
prepped <- recipe(tsdb) %>%
  step_dct(ts, k = 8, preserve = TRUE) %>%
  prep()


tsdb_dct <- bake(prepped, tsdb)
tsdb_dct
```

```{r}
indices <- prepped$steps[[1]]$coefs$ts

tsdb_recon <- tsdb_dct %>%
  reconstruct(starts_with("ts."), indices = indices, n = 60)
```

```{r}
tsdb_recon %>%
  sample_n(5) %>%
  unnest(c(ts, recon, n)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(n)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = ts, group = id), color = "red") +
  geom_line(aes(y = recon, group = id), color = "blue") +
  facet_wrap(~id)
```
